publ: by Rainforest Protectors of Sri Lanka
name: RainforestProtectorsofSriLanka
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Rainforest Protectors of Sri Lanka is a non-profit volunteer based environmental organization dedicated to protecting the last remaining rainforests and natural habitat in Sri Lanka. Through the Alexa Skill, you can receive latest updates and volunteer opportunities. Simply enable the skill and ask Alexa "What's my Flash Briefing?" and you will receive updates from Rainforest Protectors when they are published along with your regular flash briefing from other sources.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
